name: Image
description: Basic image component with theme support and accessibility features. Provides a simple, accessible way to display images with proper alt text and responsive capabilities.

examples.name: Decorative Image
examples.description: Decorative image with empty alt text

when_to_use: Show product images, photos, or illustrations
Create visual elements that don't need captions or complex layouts
Embed images in forms or simple layouts
Display decorative images with proper accessibility handling
when_not_to_use: When you need captions or complex image layouts - use figure component instead
For background images - use CSS background properties
When images need interactive features - consider specialized components
For responsive image sets - use picture element or responsive image solutions
best_practices: Always provide meaningful alt text for informative images
Use empty alt text (alt="") for purely decorative images
Optimize images for web performance (proper formats and sizes)
Consider responsive image techniques for different screen sizes
Ensure images have appropriate contrast with background
Test image loading and fallback states
Use descriptive filenames and proper image formats

accessibility.notes: Component properly handles alt text including empty alt for decorative images. Ensure images have sufficient contrast when overlaid with text.

variations: Theme variations: Light and dark theme support
Sizing: Explicit width and height attributes supported
Accessibility states: Informative images vs decorative images
Content types: Photos, illustrations, icons, diagrams

findings: Users expect images to load quickly and display properly
Alt text is crucial for screen reader users and SEO
Proper image sizing prevents layout shifts during loading
Consistent image presentation improves overall design coherence
